pages.title: Decay Away
pages.text: The last type of decay was not only dangerous, but also quite a pain to get rid of.$(br)Now that you've discovered Moonstone, the only thing left to do is to perfect your recipe. This time, though, to heal instead of flooding the world.$(br2)Yeah, that's probably better.
Removes 99 % of all self-replicating microorganisms.$(br)Apply directly to infected area.
